commit message: Added support for widget with S4

Merge pull request from 1karu5: Add support for new widget picker.
Enable Voice Notify to request audio focus when speaking

Merge pull request #15 from ScottAlbertine/master

Enable Voice Notify to request audio focus when speaking
Fix status not updating on resume.
Add option for ignoring empty notifications.
Add support for more audio streams: Voice, Ring, Alarm

Set audio focus and ignore empty defaults to true.

Update support_summary string.

Fix handling of TTS initialization.

-Handle TTS init error by showing toast and not attempting to speak.
-Hold subsequent messages until TTS is initialized, then add to queue.

A few other minor tweaks in Service class.
Update Italian translation and bump version.
